title.bibl: Dziennik Zjednoczenia, Feb. 8, 1927. The Symphony Orchestra Will Play Polish Music

div.bibl: Dziennik Zjednoczenia, Feb. 8, 1927. THE SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA WILL PLAY POLISH MUSIC

body.p: Miss Eleanor Koskiewicz, the promising young pianist, will appear as the soloist at the Popular Concert of the Chicago Symphony Orchestra on Thursday evening, March 10th, 1927 at Orchestra Hall. Miss Koskiewicz was selected through a competitive recital at which many other accomplished young pianists took part.
Mr. Frederick Stock, the conductor has promised to play selections by Polish composers.
